title: Samples, ca. 1910
dimensions:

    Weft: 64.5 cm [25.5"] Selvedge right, cut other side.

creditline: Gift of Margaret and Teresa Gloster in memory of Mary and Margaret McElligott

a. green warp and gold color weft
b. rust color ground and gold color weft
